title: Smoke Free, Walk-In Closets, Secured Entry with Intercom
posting_body: Solaire is a smoke-free, luxury apartment community for seniors 62 years of age and better who prefer a serene lifestyle.
We have studios, one, two and three bedroom apartments with spacious closets, carpeted floors, balconies, and patios.
Solaire is a welcoming community with on-site beauty salon, library, community center, weekly activities, sauna, fitness center, pool, laundry, and much more.
Don’t miss your chance to enjoy peaceful living at Solaire, call today!
-Application Fees Per Apartment, Not Per Person
-Online Payment Options (Credit Card, Debit Card and ACH)
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change.
